All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, SwingChatClientHandler.Callback
public class SwingChatClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements SwingChatClientHandler.Callback

Simple chat client based on Swing & MINA that implements the chat protocol.

Apache MINA Project
